DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate SBI Dietary Management Mild Moderate Crohn 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multi-center , pilot study evaluate SBI 10 g BID compare match placebo 12 week follow 12 week open-label extension SBI 10 g BID ( EnteraGam ) dietary management mild moderate Crohn 's disease . The effect SBI evaluate Crohn 's disease relate symptom inflammation symptom control measure Crohn 's disease activity index ( CDAI ) score plasma stool marker inflammation . The patient 's quality life also assess indicator disease state .
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis mild moderate Crohn 's disease least 3 month . Screening CDAI > 150 ≤ 250 base subject recall . Average great two liquid soft stool per day abdominal pain intensity score > 1 . Subject least one positive biomarker inflammation : fecal calprotectin > 100 µg/g ; elevate Creactive protein ( CRP ) > 2 mg/dL . Positive stool test pathogenic bacteria include Clostridium difficile O & P . Confirmed intestinal stricture obstructivelike clinical symptom . Bowel resection within previous 6 month . Change medical therapy : must stable dose corticosteroid ( prednisone prednisolone ) less equal 20 mg per day 2 week prior screen , budesonide less equal 9 mg per day 2 week prior screen , 5aminosalicylates 2 week prior screen , immunomodulators 6 week prior screen . Taking great 20 mg per day corticosteroid ( prednisone prednisolone ) great 9 mg budesonide . Received biologic therapy past 2 year . Diagnosis one comorbid condition ( ) require medical surgical therapy may affect bowel function , gastrointestinal symptom . Serious infection 3 month prior enrollment . Allergy intolerance beef ingredient use product . Participated investigational drug device study within 30 day . Does access internet . Taken EnteraGam®
